message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the majority, but you get a good chunk to start.
That's a very uneven split, Alice. Let's be more realistic. How about this?
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a majority share.  Let's get this done.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm being more than fair. Meet me in the middle or this deal is off!
I'm moving closer to your offer, but I'm not giving up the majority share.  We're running out of time, Bob.
This is my final offer, Alice. A 50/50 split is the only fair way to do this. Take it or leave it.
